LIMIT_MONTHLY_PAGE_LOADS_HELP: How many times comments are loaded.
LIMIT_MONTHLY_API_CREDITS_HELP: How much of our API you have used for custom integrations.
LIMIT_MONTHLY_SMALL_WIDGETS_CREDITS_HELP: How many requests you make for small widgets (comment counts, recent comments, etc).
LIMIT_MONTHLY_COMMENTS_STORED_HELP: How many comments were left this month.
LIMIT_SSO_USERS_HELP: How many SSO Users you have.
LIMIT_DOMAINS_HELP: How many sites, or domains, you have in your account.
LIMIT_MANAGED_TENANTS_HELP: How many sub-tenants your tenant manages.
